title: Connected Learning Experience Design and Implementation for Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of mathematics pedagogy and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Mathematics teacher training program for professionals from specialized fields. Requires collaborative learning environment construction using digital networks

learning_goals: Learners design three or more strategies to apply the three core elements of connected learning (peer sharing, care, experimentation) in actual classrooms
Learners perform collaborative problem-solving processes at least twice by sharing educational practice cases with peer teachers via digital platforms (e.g., Twitter chats)
Learners analyze their educational practices through reflective journaling and propose five improvement strategies for creating a human-centered learning environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
